page.title: 08Farming in Woottton Bassett
page.content: At the{market}many goods are for sale such as china,glassware,clothing, jewellery,books,stationary,balloons, food,military clothing and plants. {Goods}come from the general public, warehouses:Essex,Sunderland,Birmingham ,Leicester,London,wholesalers:Manchest er,Bristol & Avonmouth.It takes from 15 mins. to 2 hrs. to set a stall up. People have worked at the market from 2 mths.to 38 years.The busiest days are Friday & Saturday.{Stallholders}go to markets in Faringdon,Bath, Calne, Swindon,Wootton Bassett,Bristol, Highworth,Bradenstoke,Cirencester, Witney,Carterton,Chippenham,Pewsey Devizes & Hungerford.Only one stall welcomed rain because it watered the plants.8 out of 9 stalls have had more than 1 case of pilfering.The present market started in 1980.There are about 25 stalls & the market is flourishing.
